page.title: 07MY MUM'S TYPICAL DAY
page.content: SHE GETS UP AT 7.30AM, HAS BREAKFAST OF WEETABIX, TOAST AND COFFEE, HAS A SHOWER AND GETS DRESSED. SHE SEES ME TO SCHOOL AND DRIVES TO HARROWBARROW WHERE SHE TEACHES REMEDIAL READING GROUPS AND TAKES 3RD AND 4TH YEARS FOR MATHS. SHE GOES HOME AND ON THE WAY DOES SOME SHOPPING. SHE HAS AN APPLE AND COFFEE FOR LUNCH THEN GOES INTO TOWN TO PLAY SQUASH. AFTERWARDS SHE HAS A DRINK OF COKE AND DRIVES HOME. SHE HAS A CUP OF COFFEE AND PREPARES SALAD FOR TEA. SHE HELPS ME TO DO SOME SEWING. AFTER I HAVE TEA MUM TAKES ME TO BROWNIES. MUM COMES HOME, HAS HER TEA THEN MUM AND DAD CLEAR AWAY AND WASH UP. MUM READS THE PAPER BEFORE COLLECTING ME FROM BROWNIES. SHE DOES THE IRONING, SEES ME TO BED, AND FINISHES READING THE PAPER. SHE HAS A CUP OF COFFEE, WATCHES THE 'NEWS AT TEN' AND GOES TO BED AT 10.35PM.
